Class StudentManager

java.lang.Object
studentmanager.StudentManager
public class StudentManager extends Object
Handles user interaction, file I/O, and high-level application logic for managing students and their grades via command-line interface.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the application loop, loading existing data and presenting menu options to the user.

    • createStudentFromInput

      private Student createStudentFromInput()
      Create a student from user's input in command line interface
      Returns:
      An object of student consisting of full names, and gender.

    • enterGrades

      private void enterGrades(Student student)
      Take a student object and assign their grades
      Parameters:
      student - The student's object

    • ShowMenu

      private void ShowMenu()

    • handleAddStudent

      private void handleAddStudent()
      Handles the Add student option in the menu by calling the createStudentFromInput() method.

    • handleViewAllStudents

      private void handleViewAllStudents()
      Iterate through all the HashMap of students and display their full details.

    • handleStudentLookUp

      private void handleStudentLookUp()
      Handles the View A Student option in the menu by getting the unique identifier of the student.

    • saveStudentsToFile

      private void saveStudentsToFile()
      Saves all current student data to a file in CSV format. Overwrites the existing file if present.

    • loadStudentsFromFile

      private void loadStudentsFromFile()
      Loads student data from the save file if it exists. Reconstructs student objects and populates the students map.
